author: mmascher
body:
REST:
- Fixes status when there are failure in schedd bootstrap
- Fix unbound local variable in status
- Add comma to regexp for axtrajdl arguments
  TaskWorker:
- Fix available sites for privateMC after changes for automatically take site blacklist from the SSB
- send correct SyncCE to dashboard
  Client:
- Fix the bootstrap script for CMSSW and COMP env separation
- Make sure firstEvent is not negative in dryrun
title: CRAB3 fixes for June release
